pages.title: Do you have a link to the evidence?

components.name: UjidZI
components.content: It’s helpful if you can send us links to the relevant pages, or posts if it was posted on social media.

components.name: rfUYC
components.title: Help me find the link
components.content: If you’re on a website, the link appears in the bar at the top of the page. An example of a link is, www.gov.uk/page/1234/content#.

components.title: Do you have a link to the material?
components.name: doyouhavealink
OQrrkG
components.content: This could be an image or video, for example. Evidence is helpful should the material be deleted before we can find it.It’s safe to save evidence to your device for the purpose of reporting it to us. We recommend deleting it afterwards.

components.name: 3jdOpV
components.title: Help me take a screenshot
components.content: Try this:Press the Shift key (⇧), command (or Cmd), and 3The screenshot will be saved to your DesktopYou can now upload it to the formTry this:Press the Ctrl key and the switch window keyThe screenshot will be saved to your DownloadsYou can now upload it to the formIf that doesn’t work, try pressing Ctrl and F5.When viewing the material:Press the Prt Scr key (or similar) to take a copy of your screenPaste the image into Microsoft Paint or a similar applicationSave the file to your computerUpload the file to the formIf that doesn’t work, you may need to search for how to take screenshots on your particular computer model.

pages.title: Is there anything else you can tell us?

components.name: HETM3o
components.content: Details may include:who shared the materialwhen it was shareda description, if you haven’t provided a link or evidence

pages.title: Are you willing to be contacted if necessary?

components.name: P8QtJ
components.content: Your details will be shared with the Counter-Terrorism Internet Referral Unit in case they need more information. Your details will be kept confidential and won’t be used for any purposes other than those stated in the privacy policy.

components.name: contactRadio
components.title: Are you willing to be contacted if necessary?

pages.title: Yes I have a link to the material

components.title: Link to the material
components.hint: Please put in the link to the material here
components.name: blarGGH

No, I don't have a link

No, I don't want to be contacted
